explanations.machine learning: The paper uses deep learning models for predicting asset returns and calculating volatility, which falls under the broader category of machine learning.
explanations.deep learning: The paper specifically mentions the use of a deep learning model (Encoder-Decoder network) for predicting asset returns and calculating volatility.
explanations.neural network: The Encoder-Decoder model is a type of neural network architecture used in the paper for prediction tasks.
explanations.encoder-decoder: The paper explicitly mentions using an attention-based Encoder-Decoder model for predicting asset returns and calculating volatility.
explanations.attention mechanism: The paper uses an attention-based Encoder-Decoder model, indicating the use of attention mechanisms to improve prediction accuracy.
